title: API Gateway to AWS Lambda to Amazon DynamoDB with Go and AWS SAM
description: Use AWS SAM to deploy a REST API connected to AWS Lambda, that puts items in Amazon DynamoDB.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern explains how to deploy an AWS SAM application that includes an API Gateway, AWS Lambda Function, written in Go, and writes items to an Amazon DynamoDB table.
See the README in the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Micah Walter
authors.bio: Sr. Solutions Architect @ AWS. Serverless enthusiast.
